title: Android app deals of the day: Beggar’s Ride, Mobile Doc Scanner, Homo Machina, more
content:
Monday’s best Android app deals are now up for the taking with top-tier titles, productivity suites, and more. On the hardware side of things, we have great offers available on OnePlus 9/Pro handsets and the Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE, but for now we are kicking off the week in Android app deals with Google Play’s latest price drops. Highlights include titles like The Beggar’s Ride, Mobile Doc Scanner (MDScan) + OCR, Homo Machina, Heroes of Flatlandia, Evoland, freebie icon packs, and more. Head below the fold for a closer look. 

more…
